Lock & Unlock¶

Handlers of correct and incorrect User Password inputs.

void kp_btn_enable()¶

kp_btn_enable() - enable interrupts on GLSK SWT buttons.

Return: void.

void kp_btn_disable()¶

kp_btn_disable() - disable interrupts on GLSK SWT buttons.

Return: void.

void kp_lock_keypad(struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_lock_keypad() - lock keypad. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Return: void.

void kp_unlock_keypad(struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_unlock_keypad() - unlock keypad. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Return: void.

void kp_single_opening(struct sk_lcd *lcd, struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_main_settings() - single openning. @struct sk_lcd *lcd: LCD for comunication with user. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Unlock keypad for ‘delay_open_s’ seconds and lock it back. Suited or Mode 1.

Return: void.

void kp_toggle_keypad_state(struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_main_settings() - change keypad state. @struct sk_lcd *lcd: LCD for comunication with user. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Unlock keypad if in was locked adn vise versa. Suited or Mode 2.

Return: void.

void kp_discard_fails(struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_welcome() - discard info about fails. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Return: void.

void kp_welcome(struct sk_lcd *lcd, struct kp_lock *keypad)¶

kp_welcome() - handle correct User Password input. @struct sk_lcd *lcd: LCD for comunication with user. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data.

Handle correct User Password input according to keypad mode: unlock keypad for delay_open_s’ seconds or switch keypad state.

Return: void.

void kp_fail(struct sk_lcd *lcd, struct kp_lock *keypad, int count)¶

kp_fail() - handle incorrect User Password input. @struct sk_lcd *lcd: LCD for comunication with user. @struct kp_lock *keypad: keypad lock data. @bool count: if true - this fail have to be counted,

if false - jaste show waiting timer

Handle correct User Password input. Block keypad for ‘delay_wait_cur_s’ seconds if there were more or equal to ‘fails_low’ failed attempts of input User Password. If keypad works in HIGHT_SECURITY mode, handle situations if there were more or equal to ‘fails_hight’ failed attempts of input User Password.

Return: void.
